DOC.brief_summary: The Pediatric Mood Disorders Program at the University of Illinois at Chicago is conducting a research study examining how mindfulness can help teenagers stay healthy and prevent depression relapse.
DOC.brief_title: Mindfulness Intervention to Study the Neurobiology of Depression
DOC.detailed_description: Study involves: - Brain scan using fMRI technology - Questions about mood and behavior - Meeting with a clinician - Possibility of 8 weekly treatment sessions using mindfulness - Ongoing assessment of depression for next 2 years Eligible participants will be compensated for their time.
DOC.criteria: between the ages of 12 and 18 history of major depressive disorder braces afraid of small spaces
